front.title: Framework of COPS-PR Policy Information Base for Accounting Usage

abstract.t: This document establishes a flexible PIB framework for accounting. The accounting framework accommodates usage related data for accounting purposes needed for a wide variety of emerging technologies. The framework is re-usable and can be extended with additional accounting PIB modules to make it specific to certain client types. This document also contains examples of an accounting framework PIB module and an accounting PIB for diffserv.
